Interface PartidaDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
PartidaDAOImpl
public interface PartidaDAO
PartidaDAO interface for managing Partida (game) objects in a data access layer. It provides methods to insert, retrieve, update, and delete Partida records.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    actualizar(Partida partida)
    Updates an existing Partida record in the data source.
    void
    eliminar(int id)
    Deletes a Partida record by its unique identifier.
    void
    insertar(ArrayList<Jugador> jugadores)
    Inserts a new Partida object into the data source with a list of Jugador objects.
    Partida
    obtener(int id)
    Retrieves a Partida object by its unique identifier.
    ArrayList<Partida>
    obtenerTodos()
    Retrieves all Partida objects from the data source.

  • Method Details

    • insertar

      void insertar(ArrayList<Jugador> jugadores)
      Inserts a new Partida object into the data source with a list of Jugador objects.
      Parameters:
      jugadores - the list of Jugador objects to be associated with the Partida

    • obtener

      Partida obtener(int id)
      Retrieves a Partida object by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the Partida
      Returns:
      the Partida object if found, otherwise null

    • obtenerTodos

      ArrayList<Partida> obtenerTodos()
      Retrieves all Partida objects from the data source.
      Returns:
      a list of all Partida objects

    • actualizar

      void actualizar(Partida partida)
      Updates an existing Partida record in the data source.
      Parameters:
      partida - the Partida object with updated values

    • eliminar

      void eliminar(int id)
      Deletes a Partida record by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the Partida to be deleted
